dict.acceptation: 财产，财富；富豪（阶级）；丰富，大量；繁荣；

sent.orig: As the matter of fact, Wealth control you who pursue wealth excessively.
sent.trans: 自以为拥有财富的人，其实是被财富所拥有。

sent.orig: Wealth that you hoard is not yours, wealth ymcf that you have given is really yours.
sent.trans: 你囤积起来的财富并不是你的，你布施出去的财富才真正是你的。

sent.orig: Wisdom he has accumulated more wealth (the total wealth will remain basically unchanged).
sent.trans: 智慧让他积累了更多财富（总财富基本不变）。

sent.orig: You can become wealthy by creating wealth or by appropriating wealth created by other people.
sent.trans: 你可以通过创造财富或掠夺他人创造的财富而致富。

sent.orig: Many people spend their health for wealth, and then try to spend their wealth for health.
sent.trans: 许多人先利用健康去寻找财富，然后再尽力用财富换取健康。
